options.ftfw.title: RTFW Options
options.ftfw.requires_confirmation.name: Requires confirmation
options.ftfw.requires_confirmation.descr: Open confirmation screen before opening the wiki article. This is useful to avoid accidentally triggering the feature.
options.ftfw.language.name: Wiki language
options.ftfw.language.description: Set your preferred language, overriding game language setting.
options.ftfw.open_keybinds.name: Go to keybinds settings
options.ftfw.open_keybinds.description: Open the keybinds settings page to configure FTFW's keybinds.
